thread.title: One dead in crash between truck, train of lawmakers: White House

author: Reuters Editorial
title: One dead in crash between truck, train of lawmakers: White House
text:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - One person has died and another person has been seriously injured in a crash in Virginia between a truck and a train carrying Republican lawmakers, the White House said on Wednesday.
“There is one confirmed fatality and one serious injury. There are no serious injuries among members of Congress or their staff,” said White House press secretary Sarah Sanders.
Reporting by Roberta Rampton; Writing by Makini Brice; Editing by Will Dunham
